code:
// Inspired by https://github.com/material-components/material-components-ios/blob/bca36107405594d5b7b16265a5b0ed698f85a5ee/components/Elevation/src/UIColor%2BMaterialElevation.m#L61
const getOverlayAlpha=elevation=>{let alphaValue;if(elevation<1){alphaValue=5.11916*elevation**2;}else{alphaValue=4.5*Math.log(elevation+1)+2;}return(alphaValue/100).toFixed(2);};export default getOverlayAlpha;
